backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor, user/task/list/routine/spending types, tier limits, and authorization mixin setup with initial state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries for many frontend files including components, hooks, dialogs, and styling.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Explains the latency issues in task completion toggles and compares them with routines’ optimistic update flow.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH values and applies Tailwind base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app name, colors, icons, and standalone display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache installation, cleanup, and network‑first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping TaskManager in ThemeProvider with toast and offline indicator components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard dialog listing users with search, pagination, tier changes, and admin promotion/demotion.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Displays a centered loading spinner and message during auth bootstrap.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation component handling plan mode toggles, long‑press detection, and action buttons with drag/gesture logic.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: Dialog component for creating a new list with a name input and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: File is empty or contains no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Renders and manages custom task lists with drag-and-drop, creation, deletion, and quick-add task actions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing an existing task’s fields, list assignment, and properties with form handling.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Displays the Eisenhower quadrant task matrix with drag-and-drop, expand/collapse, and plan mode support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, date, theme toggle, authentication controls, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: Dialog showing spending insights with charts, filters, and balance status indicators.
frontend/src/components/MonetarySettings: File is empty or contains no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Renders and manages a morning/evening routine list with add, delete, complete, drag‑and‑drop reorder, and display mode controls.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows a full‑screen offline message when the browser loses network connectivity.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Displays payroll history with editing and submission actions, including sorting, inline editing, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/PlanModeTipDialo: A simple dialog presenting drag‑and‑drop tips for plan mode with a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Settings dialog for monetary limits, earnings toggling, and user profile editing with validation and sync to backend.
Spend planning dialog supporting spend creation, presets, confirmation prompts, and deletion of spend records.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Task card with drag-and-drop and touch long‑press handling, including edit mode, mobile DnD logic, and event callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button switching between light and dark modes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: Dialog that calculates daily earnings from tasks and routines and submits payroll.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: Login landing screen with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: Task creation dialog supporting quadrant-based and custom list inputs with validation and tabbed UI.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Form for creating a user profile with name, email validation, and backend save.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanModeTip.ts: Tracks whether a user-specific plan mode tip has been shown using localStorage with legacy key migration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports many React Query hooks that wrap actor calls for user profiles, admin actions, app mode, tasks, routines, and spending data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom utility animations for streak and visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Adds local IDs to Task/List types and provides helpers to convert between backend and local representations.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Utility helpers for converting UserTier enum values to labels and listing all available tiers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main UI container orchestrating identity, user profile, tasks, routines, spending features, dialogs, and local UI state.
frontend/src/utils/dailyPrioritiesEarnin: Computes Daily Priorities income by scaling completed task weight per quadrant based on planned-weight thresholds and multiplying by a global unit.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Provides helpers to write and read stable drag payloads via DataTransfer using a custom MIME type with a text/plain fallback.
frontend/src/utils/tierErrors.ts: Parses backend tier-related errors and returns user-friendly messages for task, routine, list limits, and earnings restrictions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project schema, version, overall app summary, and a list of existing feature definitions.
